Release Notes for  STM32CubeWL3 Sigfox Middleware 

Copyright © 2025 STMicroelectronics

Purpose

This Middleware provides the Sigfox Middleware for the stm32wl3x products. This covers

  • STM32WL3x devices

This driver is composed of 4 directories:

  • Retriever
  • Monarch
  • SigfoxLib
  • SigfoxLibTest

Update History

Main Changes

  • SLA0044 Legal terms updated to latest revision (Rev 6 / October 2025)

Contents

  • Version of embedded Sigfox libraries:
    • Retriever : V1.0.0
    • Monarch: V1.2.0
    • SigfoxLib: V2.10.0
    • SigfoxLibTest: V0.8.0

Warning

  • When creating a Sigfox application, it is important to use the linker file provided in the Applications folder. Otherwise, CubeMX will use the standard linker file.

Known Limitations

  • None

Main Changes

First Official Release of STM32CubeWL3 (STM32Cube for STM32WL3x lines) Sigfox middleware supporting STM32WL3x devices

Contents

  • Version of embedded Sigfox libraries:
    • Retriever : V1.0.0
    • Monarch: V1.2.0
    • SigfoxLib: V2.10.0
    • SigfoxLibTest: V0.8.0


Warning

  • When creating a Sigfox application, it is important to use the linker file provided in the Applications folder. Otherwise, CubeMX will use the standard linker file.

Known Limitations

  • None


For complete documentation on STM32WL3x,visit: [www.st.com/stm32WL3]

This release note uses up to date web standards and, for this reason, should not be opened with Internet Explorer but preferably with popular browsers such as Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Opera or Microsoft Edge.
